This role combines expertise in data engineering, generative AI, and machine learning, focussing on building scalable data and AI products on the cloud.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Data / GEN AI Engineer

We are seeking a capability of a senior data & Generative AI Engineer with cloud competency to drive innovation at the intersection of data engineering and artificial intelligence. This role combines expertise in data engineering, generative AI, and machine learning, focussing on building scalable data and AI products on the cloud.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building scalable data and AI products on the cloud, specifically mentioning Generative AI and Machine Learning expertise. This aligns with the GenAI Engineer profile's focus on developing and deploying applications built on generative models, combined with cloud competency.

phrases: building scalable data and AI products on the cloud
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'data engineering' directly maps to this category. 'Building scalable data and AI products on the cloud' implies the infrastructure and pipeline work inherent in data engineering for AI products.
Directly mentions 'Generative AI' and 'machine learning', which are core to the modeling task. 'Artificial intelligence' is a broader term encompassing these.

phrases: building scalable data and AI products on the cloud
job_tasks.justification: The description focuses on building 'products', which implies software development to integrate AI capabilities into usable systems, especially when combined with cloud deployment.

phrases: building scalable data and AI products on the cloud
job_tasks.justification: 'Cloud competency' and 'building scalable data and AI products on the cloud' suggest the operational aspects of deploying and maintaining AI systems in a cloud environment.

phrases: focussing on building scalable data and AI products
